item.title: Ethan Hawke Is Onto a Big Story in FX’s ‘The Lowdown’ Trailer
item.description: He also gets beaten up a bunch in ‘Reservation Dogs’ showurnner Sterlin Harjo’s upcoming series.

item.title: The Atlantic Festival Adds ‘The Diplomat’ Season 3 First Look and Panels With Tom Hanks, Sterlin Harjo (Exclusive)
item.description: The September event, coming to New York for the first time, will also include panel discussions with Robert Downey Jr., David Letterman and Richard Ayoade.
